body.name: MIULEE 100% Blackout Linen Textured Curtains for Bedroom Solid Thermal Insulated Ivory Grommet Room Darkening Curtains & Drapes Luxury Decor for Living Room Nursery 52 x 84 Inch (2 Panels)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 25 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard products are made with at least 50% recycled content and meet social, environmental, and chemical requirements.

features: SIZE & MATERIAL:Set includes 2 panels blackout curtains（52" Wide by 84" Long). Each panel has 8 grommets.The interior diameter of hole is 1.6 inch.It's easy to hang. Curtains are made by quality faux linen.

BLACKOUT CURTAINS: Thermal insulated blackout curtains could block 100% light out to darken your room completely.Suitable for late sleepers, shift workers, seniors, infants, kids, parents, students and computer operators to enhance their quality of sleep well during the day.

TRIPE WEAVE TECHNOLOGY:We adopt tripe weave technology to make material. With the help of this technology, curtains could insulate the room from the heat and cold all the year, so that it will save energy. Also,curtains could reduce the noise to keep your room quiet. Blackout curtains could provide you a comfortable environment with privacy.
CLASSIC HOME DECOR:Quality linen curtains could decorate your room into a vintage, gorgeous and luxurious style. It is available in 8 sizes to accommodate your bedroom, living room, den,etc.
WARM TIPS:Due to different screen display, the color of actual item may vary slightly from images.Don't wash machine to protect the ivory blackout coating on the back. MIULEE TOUCH YOUR LIFE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Elegance at an Unbelievable Price!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these curtains, and I must say, they have completely surpassed my expectations! I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase, and I could not wait to share my experience.First and foremost, the quality of these curtains is simply superb. Considering the price, I was initially skeptical about the overall craftsmanship, but I was pleasantly surprised. The fabric feels and looks luxurious, and the attention to detail is remarkable. These curtains exude elegance and sophistication, making them a perfect addition to any room.One of the things that constantly amazes me is how expensive these curtains look. Several guests who have visited my house have showered compliments on them and even asked me where I had them custom-made. When I reveal that I purchased them from Amazon, their disbelief is palpable! It's a testament to the outstanding design and flawless finish of these curtains.Not only do they look fantastic, but they also enhance the overall ambiance of my living space. These curtains drape beautifully, adding a touch of opulence to the room. They create an inviting atmosphere that is truly breathtaking. I find myself admiring them every time I enter the room.Aside from their visual appeal, the functionality of these curtains is equally impressive. They block out a significant amount of light, providing privacy and creating a cozy atmosphere, particularly in the evenings. The fabric is also thick enough to help with insulation, keeping the room cooler during the hot summer months.he delivery was prompt, and the curtains were securely packaged, ensuring they arrived in perfect condition. It's clear that the seller takes great pride in their products and ensures customer satisfaction.In conclusion, these curtains have been an incredible find. The price-to-quality ratio is outstanding, and I am genuinely amazed by how elegant and high-end they look. Every time someone admires them, I can't help but proudly share that they were purchased from Amazon. If you're looking to elevate the aesthetic of your home without breaking the bank, I wholeheartedly recommend these curtains. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Super happy with these 52" x 90" blackout curtains in the ivory color! They're very well made, great quality, and the color is perfect. I was hoping they wouldn't have any yellowish tones (as some beige/ivory fabrics do) but they don't. Just a nice, crisp, neutral color. They're thick, and block out the light very well. They're a bit heavy so make sure you have a strong curtain rod. Mine didn't come too wrinkly, so I'm not going to be ironing them. Plus, I'm lazy. I'll let them settle and the fold wrinkles should work themselves out. I also bought these in copper brown but didn't like the color so much (not for this room anyway). They were darker than I expected. But I'm thrilled with these and going to buy more for my living room. 10/10 happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True black-out, great price, beautiful.
reviews.reviewText: Am I just cheap or is it ridiculous how much curtains are??? Going to Target sent me stressing… why is 1 panel $40??? No thankyou. To Amazon I go, I shoulda known from the start.Had these for about a month now, meets the needs of both my boyfriend and I. We moved into a fixer-upper. Haven’t had time to paint the master but I knew exactly what shade of grey curtain I wanted. My boyfriend sometimes works late, which means he sleeps late. He needed black out, I needed something that looked nice. These were great! 10/10 black out quality. Nice weight- slides on the rod nicely and looks top dollar. Hope to order more for other rooms as we continue to renovate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are heavy and durable. Blocks sun and the color is perfect for my beach colored bedroom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice backing and color
reviews.reviewText: This is one of four ordered curtains. The backing is not awesome and a little plastic BUT not similar to metallic plastic like another we ordered. The panels have texture and weight to hang well. The tailoring is nice and they do not have an off putting smell upon opening. The quality is better than some of the others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The color is a bit darker but they blend with the antique bedspread. They are heavy and have nice lining. If you want to take wrinkles out before you hang, put them in the dryer on low.Unfortunately, I can't hang them until the kitten gets older as he decided curtains make a wonderful tree.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply, ligh blocking, privacy encouraging
reviews.reviewText: Very simple blackout curtains. They seem thermal insulated, are nice looking and do the job I got them for.I'll have to get a picture and uodate my review.I wouldn't say they are particularly "farmhouse" (whatever that means anymore) or any particular style. Fairly classic curtains

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect blackout curtains but stylish
reviews.reviewText: I have a love/hate relationship with blackout curtains. Where my window is in my living room it is a necessity. These are much more modern than other blackout curtains. Also helps with my drafty window.

Have purchased blackout curtains from other brands before, but this one is the only one that is 1. truly blackout, 2. doesn't look cheap, and 3. is reasonably priced.Some of the issues that have led to returns is cheap looking grommets, poor quality fabric, or hand wash only. This one does not suffer from any of these problems. It should be mentioned that you should heed their advice and get a heavier curtain rod, these are definitely heavier than some of the other products I have usedIt's not cheap compared to some of the other items but provides great value
Tela gruesa que bloquea 100% la luz
The curtain material is very much like linen, they keep out the cold and were well worth the money

I love the color and the faux linen look. It definitely darkens the room and the color is true. They are a little short width wise for my window and they do not block all the light, but still works well. Taking away one star because the seller doesn't seller doesn't have anything slightly bigger!The backing is kind of rubbery and seems to help with the heat from what I've noticed. Upon hanging them up there were some wrinkles which I'm sure could be washed and dried away. I used a handheld steamer and it sort of helped, but I don't care about the wrinkles too much.Overall great purchase and recommend them :)
